climatePledgeFriendly.details: Climate neutral by ClimatePartner certifies the carbon footprint of a product was calculated and all associated emissions were offset.

features: 【Tri-fold Pocket Bluetooth Keyboard】 XK01 Mini palm-sized folding keyboard is designed in tri-fold and compact enough for easy taking. Comes with a free stand and travel carry bag, a perfect companion for frequent travelers. Maximum convenience for you with minimum weight and size!

【Multi-device Mini Keyboard】Our portable bluetooth keyboard with triple Bluetooth channels, which will maintains stable connectivity and fast response within 33ft operating range. Supports up to 3 devices such as ipad, smartphone, tablet or PC laptop.

【Responsive Quiet Keys & Number Pad】The quiet scissor switches keys offer fluid, laptop-like efficiently typing. A travel keyboard with numeric keypad makes date entry easier. A great wireless foldable keyboard suitble to work anywhere.

【USB-C Charging & Long Lasting】Bulit-in rechargeable battery, the travel keyboard recharged via the included Type-C cable. 2-3 hours full charge delivers up to 150+ days standby time or 30 days of use, great for for your business trip or vacation.

【Sturdy and Durable Hinges】The tiny keyboard exterior made of durable ABS+PC material, with innovative seamless hinges for long-term usage and keeps the board steady, without fear of daily wear and scratches. And it is lightweight enough (7 oz) for you to bring it to the coffee shop, library or anywhere you want.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Fits in PU Leather Bag Comes with a pouch that can hold the keyboard and stand which makes it easy to take anywhere. Durable Folding Hinge The hinges are strong and provide a clean closing mechanism and fold it into a compact size. Number Pad Zone Number pad with 00 key help you improve work efficiency, easy for data entry. Next page 1 COMPACT KEYBOARD 2 PU STORAGE POUCH 3 SEAMLESS FOLDING 4 WITH NUMBER KEYPAD

PORTABLE FOR TRAVEL The mini keyboard only weights 7 ounces, can be folded into your backpack or suitcase to carry around for business or vacations. MULTIMEDIA FUNCTION KEYS Press the "Fn+ F1 ~ F12" to achieve multimedia function like volume. Press "Fn + Shift + F1 ~ F12" corresponding keys to achieve FN function. MAGNETIC CLOSURE Unfold to turn on and folded to turn off, ensures hassle-free operation and saves energy. ADJUSTABLE PHONE STAND The included collasible phone stand holder provides you with a perfect viewing angle. Recording your ideas anytime, anywhere.

XK01 Full Size Travel Keyboard Foldable Wireless Portable Keyboard with Numeric Keypad, increase your workflow and productivity greatly in travel or business. LEARN MORE XKM01 Full Size Travel Keyboard and Mouse Set Multi-device portable bluetooth keyboard mouse combo, a Travel Solution for On-the-Go Professional LEARN MORE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great keyboard
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a Bluetooth keyboard to use with my phone and tablet and decided to try this one. I’m really glad I did! The keyboard is slightly smaller than a standard keyboard but it is still super comfortable to use. I like having a full number pad on the side as that is missing on my laptop and I prefer to do numbers on a keypad. The keyboard folds compactly and is stored in this really nice case that also has a pocket on the back for a stand that will hold a phone or tablet comfortably. There is an included USB-A to USB-C cable to easily charge the keyboard but the battery life is really good so you won’t have to charge it often. There are three channels you can choose as well so you can easily switch between devices that you’ve connected to the keyboard. Connecting the Bluetooth keyboard was super easy even without reading the directions. All in all, this is a great little keyboard that will definitely be traveling with me wherever I go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed on the keyboard upon opening. It was well packaged with a sleeve over the box and also the keyboard comes in a reusable pouch. I have nothing bad to say.

I may come back with an update in a month or 2!One thing but no big deal, the phone holder looks great to use however I have a cover on it and so it does not fit into the holder.

It is not very often that I get a product that far exceeds my expectations. Well, this one sure does!I needed a portable keyboard. I do a lot of typing on my phone on the road and to be honest I am no expert at typing with the phone's keyboard. I have always thought it would be nice to have a larger keyboard that would attach wirelessly to my phone but the ones I have seen are cheap and do not feel good when you type.I saw this foldable, compact, Bluetooth keyboard that is rechargeable and it seemed to have everything I would want in a portable keyboard.The keyboard arrived in some of the nicest packaging I have ever seen on any piece of electronics I have purchased.This would make for a great gift but always makes you feel good when you open up a package where the manufacturer has obviously put a lot of pride and thought into the packaging. It gives you confidence that the manufacturer has also put as much thought into the product, and they have.You first open the external box with all the printing on it. Inside is a mainly black box that opens to reveal the contents.The package comes with the tri-fold keyboard, a USB-C charging cable, a nice case with a classy magnetic clasp, a user manual, a warranty card, and what appears to be a greeting card that includes information about the manufacturer.The case comes with a small pocket in the back and inside of that is a small stand for holding your smartphone while you type. Very ingenious.The keyboard is trifold, opens up easily, and is very solid once open.Pairing with your smart device is very simple. You enter your Bluetooth pairing mode on your phone and it finds the keyboard immediately.Once paired it works flawlessly.I am used to typing on a small laptop and this keyboard felt just as good as my laptop keyboard.All the typing is instantaneous with no lag at all.The little stand that they include with this package holds my Samsung Flip phone perfectly and can be adjusted to different angles.When done the keyboard folds up nicely and is very small.I am very impressed with this keyboard. It has far exceeded my expectations and is better than any other portable keyboard I have tried before.For the price, this is a steal! It's great value for your money and if you are looking for a portable keyboard then stop looking! I highly recommend this one.

it folds up so small!you can connect it to up to three deviceswhen you are in the bluetooth center on your device scroll down to see the word accessories and it will reveal the word prontoarc and ask to pair. select yes and bango there you are! connected.i dont really love where the stand is stored. its on the outside of the keyboard case with no flap or button to secure it in place. and i’m not sure how to access the emojis.its quite narrow along the board. it turns on when you open the keyboard up, and shuts off when you close it.this is so totally great to travel with. the compactness is great for which ever way you travel and need to do work on the go. perfect for the plane or train. . it allows you more room on you device since the keyboard is a separate piece. the tablet will still show you word suggestions.i have the arrow keys on my android because it helps editing now i can do the same on my ios with this portable keyboard. one reason i dislike ios is because trying to highlight the word with the touch screen is daunting even when i want to move the cursor it goes everywhere i don't want it to go!the only thing i really hate is the keys don't light up. my laptop is the same and i absolutely hate it. you have to have a light on so you can see the letters. i don't quite understand why companies do this with keyboards. all keyboards should be illuminated in my opinion. but i understand that will effect battery life. but we have LED light now that don't need much power to be lit and LED last a lot longer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Well-built rechargeable folding keyboard with number pad, Bluetooth, case and phone stand
reviews.reviewText: Review for: "Foldable Compact Bluetooth Keyboard, ProtoArc XK01 Mini Portable Keyboard with Number Pad, Pocket-Sized Wireless Travel Keyboard for iPad iPhone Mac Android Windows iOS, Sync Up to 3 Devices"Brand: ProtoArcI am very impressed with this folding Bluetooth keyboard! I was looking for a way to type with my phone, but prefer having the number pad on my keyboard, so this is perfect!The keyboard comes with a case, phone stand, Quick Start Guide (for Bluetooth connection), User Manual, USB-C to USB-A charging cord (no AC adapter) and a thank you envelope with support information and catalogue of other products.The Bluetooth connection is "ProtoArc XK01 Mini" and there are 3 function buttons on the keyboard to connect. I paired with Bluetooth on my phone then pressed Fn-Q and it came up with the "Pair Device" prompt on my phone. It was easy to connect.The keyboard itself is well-built and the hinges feel like metal. It was nice they added the phone stand to the set as you usually need one while using a keyboard to type. The phone stand folds nicely into the back pocket of the case.At first I didn't like the snap to close the case, but then realized it is magnetic and snaps itself into place without any force.The case with the keyboard and phone stand inside weighs about 267g and is about 8.25" x 4.75" x 1 1/8" (21 cm x 12.1 cm x 2.7 cm). The keyboard itself weighs 209g and is about 12 7/8" long x 3 3/4" wide x 1/4"-7/16" thick (32.6 cm x 9.7 cm x 0.5-1.2cm thick). The keyboard when folded is about 7 3/16" x 3 3/4" x 1/2" (18.3 cm x 9.5 cm x 1.5 cm). The phone stand weighs about 25g and is about 3.25" x 2 13/16" x 1/4"-7/16" thick (8.3 cm x 7.1 cm x 0.5-1 cm thick).The keypad on this folding keyboard is just slightly smaller than a regular keyboard. From Q to P is about 6.75" (17.3 cm) and on my regular keyboard this span is about 7 1/4" (18.5 cm). The height from T to V is about 1 15/16" (4.8 cm) on this keyboard, whereas it's about 2 1/8" (5.4 cm) on my regular keyboard.Overall, I'm happy with the size, portability, and durability of this keyboard.

I'm genuinely almost shocked with how good this product is.First, I'll start by saying that the packaging and presentation is really top notch. I know for many people this may be far less important than functionality, but it does help instill confidence in the quality of the product. The box itself feels rather premium with a very nice feeling, smooth cardboard. Even the insert inside is the same, high quality feelings packaging. There's even a nice envelope inside (also high quality) with a note from the lead of the company, talking about the product and business.Then on to the keyboard itself. It connected via bluetooth seamlessly for me, the keys felt great, and were very responsive. Basically everything you could hope for in a keyboard. That would be enough there for basic usage. But there's more to love.Despite being very compact, there's even multimedia keys (play/pause, fast forward, etc. accessible via the Fn button), 3 separate bluetooth connections (for seamless connection to 3 different devices) and there's even a little separate collapsible stand to hold a mobile device, like a phone or tablet on the table in front of you.On top of all of this, it even comes with a nice little carrying case that holds both the keyboard and the stand.The keyboard itself feels nice to use, as I mentioned, but it also feels durable. The hinges don't feel too fragile at all, and in fact, while somewhat hard to describe, the hinges have a sliding piece of plastic that covered the hinge once extended, to add some extra rigidity to the device while open. This hinge support doesn't require any work from the user though. They automatically slide into place as you open/unfold the keyboard. A very nice touch!Really, just having a keyboard that had nice feeling and responsive buttons would be enough. But all the additional things I mention above really make this feel like it's in another class of it's own. It's really incredible how compact and portable, yet truly functional it feels. I rarely write this much in a review, but I really can't recommend this enough.

This sleek, pocket-sized keyboard promised to revolutionize my typing experience on various devices, and I must say, it hasn't disappointed. Let me share my journey with this compact yet powerful tool. 🚀💼Pros: Pocket-Sized Powerhouse: The ProtoArc XK01's foldable design is a true game-changer for someone like me who is always on the go. Folding down to a size smaller than my smartphone, it easily fits into my bag or pocket, making it incredibly convenient for travel or remote work situations. Gone are the days of lugging around bulky keyboards! 🧳👩‍💼 Multi-Device Harmony: One of the standout features of this keyboard is its ability to sync with up to three devices simultaneously. Whether I'm typing an email on my iPad, responding to messages on my iPhone, or drafting a document on my laptop, switching between devices is seamless and hassle-free. This flexibility has significantly boosted my productivity. 🔄📱 Universal Compatibility: The ProtoArc XK01 isn't picky when it comes to devices. It effortlessly connects to a wide range of platforms, including iPad, iPhone, Android, Windows, and Mac. The inclusion of a number pad is an added bonus, especially for tasks that require numerical input, making it a versatile tool for both work and personal use. 💻📱Cons: Build Material: While the keyboard feels sturdy overall, the predominantly plastic construction may not exude the premium quality some users prefer. While it keeps the device lightweight and portable, a slightly more robust build material could enhance the overall durability and feel of the keyboard. 🛠️🔄🔄🔍The ProtoArc XK01 Bluetooth Keyboard has become an indispensable part of my mobile workspace. Its compact design, multi-device syncing capabilities, and universal compatibility make it a must-have tool for anyone who needs to type on the go. 🚀👩‍💼
